#jekyll #open-source
Pudina Fresh Jekyll Theme

A minimal yet feature-rich Jekyll theme made for personal websites and blogs. Adapted from Pudhina theme by Knhash. Added project page, speed optimizations, updated styles amongst other things.

This site uses this theme.
